name: politico
text:
Rep. Andy Harris has broken with the scientific mainstream during the pandemic — decrying stay-at-home orders and warning of a “cult of masks”

Now he's joined the hunt for coronavirus treatments with an unpaid side gig overseeing a drug company trial
https://t.co/NkUTcZVlS4

name: politico
text:
State election officials butted heads with Postmaster General Louis DeJoy on a private call today, amid worries about how the embattled U.S. Postal Service is preparing to deal with a dramatic increase in voting by mail this November

https://t.co/DB64mD8sTU

name: politico
text:
Need a quick analysis of the biggest stories of the day? Listen to POLITICO Dispatch to get important context from experts across our newsroom. Subscribe today.
https://t.co/DPUpEFlsul https://t.co/fZUzwAXI2z

name: politico
text:
Olivia Troye, who worked as an adviser to Vice President Mike Pence before leaving in August, appeared in an ad where she shared damning anecdotes that portrayed President Trump as a debilitating actor in containing the coronavirus 

https://t.co/b0IQxum66y

name: politico
text:
Trump has tied his reelection effort to the delivery of a vaccine by Election Day, but health officials involved in the distribution effort have depicted the timeline as unrealistic

https://t.co/wVJlbdYosr

name: politico
text:
“That’s no way for a woman to become the first president, that’s for sure,” President Trump said during a campaign rally in Wisconsin, referring to a possible Harris vice presidency.

https://t.co/FiuIUbdyOh

name: politico
text:
Six months in, Trump has yet to prevent a single state from sending voters the unsolicited ballots he claims, with minimal evidence, are ripe for fraud

https://t.co/j5jAiqgXiC

name: politico
text:
More than 35,500 vote-by-mail ballots didn’t count in Florida’s recent primary, rejected because of missed deadlines or technical flaws

https://t.co/mzFbJH73PE

name: politico
text:
The White House has not said whether Trump will travel to United Nations headquarters in New York to give his remarks. Other world leaders are staying home

https://t.co/I6p7vAZbVV
